item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Harper Government Invests in Small Craft Harbours in Manitoba
3, 2013) - James Bezan, Member of Parliament for Selkirk-Interlake, on behalf of the Honourable Gail Shea, Minister of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, today announced that the Government of Canada will invest $3.2 million in maintenance, repair, construction and dredging projects at small craft harbours in Manitoba. "Our Government recognizes that small craft harbours play a vital role for the fishing industry and local communities," said MP Bezan. "The investment announced today demonstrates this Government's ...

item.title: Posted on Twitter

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca (blog)
item.description:
15 new MP-sponsored bills, motions on House priority list
Following last weekend's news that the government will now require warning labels for tanning equipment, Conservative backbench MP James Bezan has abandoned his long-standing private members' bill that would have also banned the use of such ...

item.title: Mentioned by CTV News
item.description:
MP Glover files new expense claim amid election expense scandal
House Speaker Andrew Scheer says it's up to the committee on procedure and House affairs to decide if Glover and her Manitoba colleague James Bezan should lose their MP privileges until their fight with Elections Canada is settled. Scheer had earlier ...
